working conditions
social behaviour and attitudes
drug abuse, alcohol and smoking
health care and medical treatment
gender and gender roles
person
survey data
cross-section

The basic population includes nurses from Csongrád county as well as students of health secondary schools. This is a 600-personrandom sample, which includes 10% of the county nurses. From this random diminishing sample 420 nurses (218 registered nurses and 202 students) were willing to complete the questionnaire. At randomly selected wards a speciefied number of nurses were interviewed.
self-administered questionnaire
A
